title: Papa no Iu Koto o Kikinasai! - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Ecchi   Harem   Romance   Shounen
tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   Character Growth   Childcare   Clubs   College/University   Guardian Relationship   Hard-Working Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Tsundere
author: Matsu Tomohiro
description: 19-year Segawa Yuuta was looking forward to start his new university life and go through a normal university life, making new friends, etc, etc. But suddenly, when the plane which his elder sister and brother-in-law were on went missing, he became the 'father' of his three young nieces! Now, his six-tatami mat apartment not just has to accommodate himself, but 14-year old Sora, 10-year old Miu, and 3-year old Hina. What will be the fate of Yuuta?>
